name: Paydirt
description:
Game prototype for WGJ 114

Status: Working prototype, minimal content, bugs

NOTES: Apologies I could not finish this jam concept, but play around with what I managed to make so far.

KNOWN BUGS: Some models fail their collision checks and remain in place.

How To Play:

Chip away at the blocks - using your mouse as fast as you can - revealing hidden secrets. Don't run out of money and try to collect all the museum quality items.

You may rotate the blocks by grabbing the lazy susan they sit on.

There are only 4 items to collect (one is split into two collectables) and no win screen.
